title: Really, what the hell is this.
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/28f341e3ae7d880a999a55d338a58991.png

I mean, my team had me, so we won, but this is some seriously bs matchmaking.

replies.body:
Standard match making on OCE.

If you want to climb here it's practically 99% luck.

Level 30s with a Challenger in their Placements????? And Golds matched with them too????

Is this Flex, because I've been placed with Plats before (I'm Bronze)?? But if this is SoloQ... wow...
How can it be ranked whens theres two ekkos and two lee sins ðŸ¤”
You still get crap like this happening in YoloQ and Flex.

Not for me nothing but bronze and low silvers with the occasional smurf

Maybe a plat everynow and then in flex

Feelsgoodman (not really ðŸ˜§)

Looks like the TF went AD.. lucky for you ;P

Your two unranked probably have rediculous win rates.  One of them wasn't placed last year so it's a smurf account if playing with these guys now. Call them anything diamond to challenger and you're even

Yeah but it's Norms (pretty sure it is, due to mirror picks), where it uses a different MMR than Rank's. A lot of people tank or screw around with their MMR, intentionally or otherwise, in Norms you know; YoloQue and all.

There are also other factors that have been mentioned before, such as late night (or should we say early morning) pubs in small regions like OCE being one.

That would be a good point, except this still happens in Ranked either YoloQ or Flex.

Next time I'm streaming League come round and see how messed up Silver Elo is.
Only time I'll ever see a match with people from my Elo only is if I duo with a Bronzie, otherwise there are high gold, plats and diamonds throughout practically every match, and there is never any balance to it either.

my personal experience

if you play late at night then the matchmaking will be insanely disproportionate as it tries to cram people together just to get a game due to low pop.

soloq: had to consistently beat plat5s with occasional high plats to climb to gold 5 from silver.

flexq: flex rank doesnt matter, had to beat people ranging from bronze 5 to challenger to climb to gold 5 in flex.
